scan_table_check.description: Code must not depend on data. This is a fundemantal architectural guard rail. The ServiceNow platform had not been designed with this constraint in mind in the beginning. More and more capabilities have been added that allow for a clear distinction between code and data. Catalog Items however is one of the examples where this distinction is not well-supported. Catalog Items by design allow code to depend on data (e.g. owner) and this should, of course, be avoided. See chapter "Data vs. Code" in the whitepaper "A mature development and deployment process" for further details.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Catalog Item depends on data
scan_table_check.short_description: A Catalog Item must not depend on data
